amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt actions pertaining to whistleblowers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 115-29 to exempt actions pertaining to whistleblowers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jeffries amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 229 (Roll no. 156).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
